review: This hotel is wheelchair accessible and the staff was very helpful
Staff allowed us to bring our dog without extra charges
The room was spacious enough for my family with two kids
Great location, but not suitable for disabled travelers
Our cat was welcome in the room and the garden
Kids loved the pool and playground
Hotel was fine but nothing special
Perfect for a family vacation with children and pets
Accessible entrance and elevator, very convenient for wheelchair users
Excellent service for travelers with mobility issues
Pet-friendly rooms and outdoor space for dogs
Fun activities for kids during the weekend
Spacious rooms, clean environment, great value
Helpful staff assisted with my wheelchair and luggage
Dog sitter available on request, very convenient
Indoor playground and babysitting services were fantastic
Good for couples and solo travelers
